problem_one_line: Phase 121 routing suggestions displayed but agents not auto-loaded, causing 60-70% token waste and 25-40% quality loss
solution_one_line: Implement Working Principle #15 with full SwarmOrchestrator integration for automatic agent loading, session persistence, and context-aware domain switching
user_feedback: Maia only loads a dedicated agent when I ask and then regularly switches back to maia. Quality of work performed is always lower quality and high token consumption from base Maia. It seems like Maia only loads a dedicated agent when I ask and then regularly switches back to maia.

phases.name: Requirements Discovery (TDD Phase 0)
phases.description: Define functional/non-functional requirements, test scenarios, architecture decisions with AI Specialists + SRE Agent pairing

phases.name: Test Design (TDD Phase 1)
phases.description: Create comprehensive test suite: 10 test scenarios (happy path, error handling, performance, integration), mock SwarmOrchestrator, validate coverage against requirements

phases.name: Hook Enhancement (Stage 0.8 Modification)
phases.description: Add SwarmOrchestrator invocation to hook, create session state file mechanism (/tmp/maia_active_swarm_session.json), implement graceful degradation

phases.name: SwarmOrchestrator Integration
phases.description: Replace _execute_agent() stub with AgentLoader integration, implement conversation-driven execution, add handoff chain tracking, performance optimization (<200ms)

phases.name: Maia Agent Check Logic
phases.deliverable: CLAUDE.md instruction update + session state reader
phases.description: Add CLAUDE.md instruction for session state check, implement context loading from /tmp/maia_active_swarm_session.json, validate agent file exists, error handling for corrupted state

phases.name: Session Persistence & Domain Switching
phases.deliverable: Domain change detection + context handoff logic
phases.description: Implement per-message domain classification, agent switching logic with context preservation, session state updates on handoffs, cleanup on conversation end

phases.name: Integration Testing
phases.description: Run 10 test scenarios with real queries, validate Phase 125 logging integration, performance profiling (<200ms hook target), error injection testing for resilience

phases.name: Documentation & Deployment
phases.deliverable: Working Principle #15 status updated, user guide, SYSTEM_STATE.md Phase 134 entry
phases.description: Update Working Principle #15 to ACTIVE status, document architecture decisions, create user guide for override commands, troubleshooting guide, SYSTEM_STATE.md entry
